titles.title: Prohibiting Detention of Youth Status Offenders Act of 2024
Prohibiting Detention of Youth Status Offenders Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to eliminate the use of valid court orders to secure lockup of status offenders, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
